sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCHAMYL, (f.e., Samuel), prophet and hero of the Caucasian mountaineers, was born in 1797. See Caucasus, vol. V. p. 258. After his defeat and capture he passed ten years in Russia, where he was well treated. In 1870 he went on pilgrimage to Mecca, and died at Medina in March of the following year.
